alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Toombs, Emanuel, east central Telfair, eastern Treutlen, southeastern Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 820 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over South Thompson, or near Lyons, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Lyons, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Twin City, Lumber City, Uvalda, Stillmore, Oak Park, Ailey, Higgston, Garfield, Santa Claus, Summertown, Alston, Nunez, Tarrytown, Ohoopee, New Branch and Covena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler
